channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report X-2023120208
item.description:
Report X-2023120208

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: GREEN RIVER
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UP Mechanical employee reported diesel fuel dripping from bottom outlet valve plug. Plug was not installed, and the handle securement pin was also not installed allowing the BOV handle to open slightly. The handle was closed stopping the release. The plug was installed and tightened, and the handle securement pin was installed.
